quote: Shall I teach you what knowledge?When you know a thing, say that you know it;when you do not know a thing,admit that you do not know it.That is knowledge
author: Confucius

quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
author: Mark Van Doren

quote: Knowledge is of two kinds. We know a subject ourselves, or we know where we can find information on it.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision.
author: Helen Keller

quote: To know how to suggest is the art of teaching.
author: Henri-Frédéric Amiel

quote: The quest for knowledge is passion to study.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Learning is not the accumulation of knowledge, but rather, one thing only: understanding
author: Donna Jo Napoli

quote: Acquiring knowledge is a form of imitation.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Begin to acquire knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: To acquire knowledge, one must study;but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
author: Marilyn Vos Savant

quote: Knowledge is a treasure, but practice is the key to it.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Knowledge is not made for understanding; it is made for cutting.
author: Michel Foucault

quote: Knowledge is a tool, and like all tools, its impact is in the hands of the user.
author: Dan Brown,  The Lost Symbol

quote: Knowledge is the food of the soul.
author: Plato

quote: Fine art is knowledge made visible.
author: Gustave Courbet

quote: Some people still think knowledge is power.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Lullaby

quote: nothing that is worth knowing can be taught
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Knowledge is in the end based on acknowledgement.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: Knowledge without application is simply knowledge. Applying the knowledge to one’s life is wisdom — and that is the ultimate virtue
author: Kasi Kaye Iliopoulos,  Living in Light, Love & Truth: You Can Positively Change Your Life by Living in Light, Love, & Truth-Awareness + Reflection + Learning + Application

quote: Knowledge is like an endless resource; a well of water that satisfies the innate thirst of the growing human soul. Therefore never stop learning... because the day you do, you will also stop maturing.
author: Chidi Okonkwo

quote: Knowledge is a destination. Truth, the journey.
author: Terry Goodkind

quote: The knowledge that we consider knowledge proves itself in action. What we now mean by knowledge is information in action, information focused on results.
author: Peter F. Drucker

quote: Knowledge unqualified is knowledge simply of something learned.
author: Plato

quote: We are all teachers, we all have knowledge and experiences that can teach others.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: Proper teaching is recognized with ease. You can know it without fail because it awakens within you that sensation which tells you this is something you have always known.
author: Frank Herbert,  Dune

quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Generally in life, knowledge is acquired to be used. But school learning more often fits Freire's apt metaphor: knowledge is treated like money, to be put away in a bank for the future.
author: Seymour Papert,  The Children's Machine: Rethinking School In The Age Of The Computer

quote: The higher knowledge, the higher responsibility
author: Muhammad Ahkam A

quote: Knowledge is the eye that must direct the foot of obedience.
author: Thomas Watson

quote: Nothing good was learnt too swiftly. Knowledge should be a purposeful accumulance of observed experience, applied and tested to the full.
author: Jane Borodale,  The Book of Fires

quote: Knowledge is of two kinds. We know a subject ourselves, or we know where we can find information upon it. When we enquire into any subject, the first thing we have to do is to know what books have treated of it. This leads us to look at catalogues, and at the backs of books in libraries.
author: Samuel Johnson,  The Life of Samuel Johnson Including a Journal of a Tour to the Hebrides, Vol 2

quote: A wise master teaches.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Correct teaching brings out human excellence.
author: Idries Shah,  Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: Experience is more important than knowledge.
author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday

quote: Knowledge is like money: To be of value it must circulate, and in circulating it can increase in quantity and, hopefully, in value.
author: Louis L'Amour,  Education of a Wandering Man

quote: The final discovery is the discovery of knowledge.
author: Kedar Joshi

quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Knowledge is very vital in life`s transformation and transition
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: The way of success is the way of continuous pursuit of knowledge.
author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich

quote: part of the art of teaching is the ability to rearrange the world for students - to force them to see things in a new way. i've known too many stupid intellectuals to believe that education and wisdom come as a package deal along with facts, it's your perspective that counts - your ability to see differently, not just to see a lot.
author: Sunny Decker,  An Empty Spoon

quote: Knowledge was scattered treasure, education organized it into art, commerce and science.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Keenly seek knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: ...knowledge imprisons you. You cannot escape it. What you know you cannot unknow. That's why knowledge is dangerous. Learning will redefine your world, irreversibly.
author: Noam Shpancer,  The Good Psychologist

quote: Knowledge is power, and the right knowledge lets man perform miraculous, almost godlike tasks.
author: Dan Brown,  The Lost Symbol

quote: Ignorance is a knowledge illiteracy.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: Knowledge & understanding mixed with ones convictions of 'experience' is hardly impositional". ~R. Alan Woods [2012]
author: R. Alan Woods,  The Journey Is The Destination: A Photo Journal

quote: Knowledge can be acquired by a suitable and complete study, no matter what the starting point is. Only one must know how to 'learn.' What is nearest to us is man; and you are the nearest of all men to yourself. Begin with the study of yourself; remember the saying 'Know thyself.
author: G.I. Gurdjieff,  Views from the Real World: Early Talks Moscow Essentuki Tiflis Berlin London Paris NY Chicago as Recollecte

quote: Education: that which reveals to the wise, and conceals from the stupid, the vast limits of their knowledge.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Knowledge will bring you the opportunity to make a difference.
author: Claire Fagin

quote: It is important to view knowledge as sort of a semantic tree -- make sure you understand the fundamental principles, ie the trunk and big branches, before you get into the leaves/details or there is nothing for them to hang on to.
author: Elon Musk
